title: mkxsubjreg
description: Creates a new registration matrix that maps from the functional volume of the source subject to the orig of the target subject through the talairach transform.

srcreg.title: Source Registration
srcreg.description: Path to the source registration file (srcreg.dat)

targreg.title: Target Registration
targreg.description: Path to the target registration file (targreg.dat)

targsubj.title: Target Subject
targsubj.description: Target subject ID; default is talairach

xfm.title: Transform Name
xfm.description: XFM file name relative to transforms

sd.title: Subjects Directory
sd.description: Directory containing subject data; default is env SUBJECTS_DIR
